pages.title: Bellows
pages.text: When powered (or when stepped on), Bellows will blow air up to 5 blocks in front of it, pushing entities in that direction.

pages.title: Additional Effects
pages.text: The air from Bellows have these additional effects: $(li)Any Furnace block next to the bellows will be sped up.$() $(li)Refreshes fire blocks. Any fire within 2 blocks of bellows will be kept alive.$() $(li)Can speed up copper aging.$() $(li)Can blow bubbles if placed in front of a Wet Spounge that is in contact with a Soap Block.$()
